channel.title: I have been banned by accident...a third time
channel.description: Yes, it has happened again, I'm using firefox if you are wondering how I got on :) But it says a 14 day ban...next time a perm ban. I really don't want to be perm banned so could someone sort this out? Thanks, Akriam

It’s a Dynamic IP. They can be helpful + shit. ;S

item.title: I have been banned by accident...a third time
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mopariffic Im Mopariffic
item.description:
@Im_Mopariffic wrote:

Guys, I had same thing… i got banned, and the AOL theory makes much sense…
I got 3 day ban for spamming (temp) and 14 day ban for breakign rule number 12.

wow, the only reason i can think of me getting the temporary 3 day ban is because of mladen… he started server team, i joined, i quit, started my own, he got angry, we argued, he spammed and advertized for himself on my thread, i said how u like spamming on his thread, i think i took mladen’s punishmet… CURSE HIM~!

item.title: I have been banned by accident...a third time
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Yes, I’m always banned when I try to use my grandma’s computer. She also uses AOL.

I logged in, said I was banned for posting trojans. Then I made a new account, to figure out what could have happened. Then it says that account is also banned. I thought wow someone really hates me. When I came home everything worked fine

Read full topic
item.source: I have been banned by accident...a third time

item.title: I have been banned by accident...a third time
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Akriam:

Alright, what if it happens again though? I don’t want my account banned. Lol BobDole is so smart, or a lucky gueser. AOL sucks…My friend has also gotten this message and he has AOL so it would make sence.

global mod privileges + ip whois = isp info

If you are able to pm while banned, tell an online mod (or me) of the situation along with your current ip, and one of us can try to go through the ban triggers list and remove that ip.

Read full topic

item.title: I have been banned by accident...a third time
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

I assume you’re using AOL (based on a couple of ips you’ve posted from). AOL provides you with a different ip every time you connect, which means that you might be getting someone else’s randomly who was ip banned. This is the primary negative aspect of ip banning. But if you try reconnecting, you should hopefully get a different ip without that ban message.

Read full topic
